name: J. Nicolas Garavito-Camargo
body:
## About me:
Currently I am a second year Physics Master student at [Universidad de los Andes](http://uniandes.edu.co/) in Colombia here I work 
with Professor [Jaime E. Forero-Romero](http://wwwprof.uniandes.edu.co/~je.forero/), My main area of research 
is galaxy formation theory. With emphasis in high redshift galaxies.

***


## Research:
### LAEs (Lyman Alpha Emitters)

I'm interested in modeling the Lyman alpha line, for this I use radiative transfer codes based on Monte-Carlo simulations. 
***
## CV: 
[CV.pdf](https://github.com/jngaravitoc/CV/blob/master/CVNicolas2014.pdf)
